channel.title: Comments on: In other unnecessary reunion news, Spandau Ballet possibly to reform

item.title: By: radiofreekevin
item.dc:creator: radiofreekevin
item.description:
How about Hi-Five? What the world needs now is an extended version of "She's Playing Hard to Get."
This is the sound of my soul, Eric. I bought a ticket to the world, but now I'm back again. Hey, they're responsible for PM Dawn's career!
item.content:encoded:
How about Hi-Five? What the world needs now is an extended version of “She’s Playing Hard to Get.”

This is the sound of my soul, Eric. I bought a ticket to the world, but now I’m back again. Hey, they’re responsible for PM Dawn’s career!
